contents.title: Vehicle Weps / Actions

contents.tooltip: Vehicles may load 1 weight of weapons per 3 points of Body. Every 3 weight of weapons re- duce cargo space by 1. Weapons of weight 4+ reduce cargo space by 2. If there is no avail- able cargo space, a weapon cannot be mount- ed. Without an empty cargo space, there is no room for a driver.
